name: Unpainted Small Elf Ears
description:
This pair of ears is well suited for halflings, pixies, Christmas elves and certain Lord of the Rings races such Legolas, Arwen and Elrond. This is a very subtle and natural elf ear. These ears are designed to be reusable with proper care and some customers have had their original set of ears for over 5 years!

Each set is hand crafted using costume grade latex and dusted with hypoallergenic baby powder.

These ears can be attached using spirit gum or any other costume adhesive that is safe for skin. While many companies suggest blending the seams with liquid latex, we find that it builds up over time creating gunky seams (latex adheres to latex) and diminishes the life of your ears. We recommend using a castor oil based make up (see our RMG Derma Creme Wheel) to paint your ears as well as blend the seams. This also allows you to match your skin tone better than you would with a universal flesh colored latex. You can also hide seams using a stylish ear cuff!

Small Elf Ears are 1 1/2 in. from front to tip.

description:

name: Stage Blood
description:
This water-based fake blood is bright red when wet, but dries brown and crusty like real blood. It is neither thick nor runny, the ideal color and consistency for a realistic fresh blood look. It can also be watered down for squirting effects. 

This product is non-toxic and can even be used in and around the mouth with blood capsules, perfect for vampires and oral injury effects.

In the image, stage blood is the one on the bottom. It has a very "fresh" look.

Comes in 1 oz. and 8 oz. Please contact us for 1 gallon size.

name: Blood Gel
description:
Blood gel is a deep red, glycerine-based blood that never dries. This allows it to maintain the look of oozing, wet, thick blood. The slow drip makes it well suited for deeper cuts and lacerations that have begun to coagulate. Both sizes come with brush caps for ease of application. Blood gel is easily removed with soap and water.

In the image, blood gel is the one in the middle. You can clearly see the slow drip it creates.

Comes in 1 oz. size. Please contact us for 20 oz. size.

name: Blood Paste
description:
Blood paste is a firm deep red blood you can smear into cavities for great gore makeups. It won't move but still appears wet. Trowel into a pre-fabricated latex wound for a no-drip blood effect or stipple onto wider areas for a splattered blood effect. This product is great for high-intensity scenes or situations when you want the effect to remain static.

In the image, blood gel is the top-most blood. It is very thick and can be molded and layered to appear deeper in certain areas.

Available in 1 oz. size. Please contact us for 20 oz. size.

name: Magic Blood Powder
description:
This super awesome powder goes on invisible but becomes a gruesome rash or cut when it comes in contact with water! 

Apply a small amount over a large area for a road rash effect or apply to a small area and run a knife dipped in water over the area for a cut in real time! Also perfect for whipping scenes.

Available in 1 gram size.

name: F/X Gelatin
description:
F/X Gelatin is the foundation of gore makeup.This modeling medium can be used to create anything from acid burns to Chelsea Grins. Simply heat the bottle in a warm water bath for a few minutes until it is fluid, check the temperature for comfort, and get to it. This products blends beautifully allowing for seamless edges and a natural finish.

This gelatin is very pliable when warm. Once it cools it remains flexible but stays in place. Can be layered with blood products for an even more gruesome finish. When you're ready to remove it, simply peel it off.

This product is great for live action as it remains flexible and allows actors and models to emote and function as normal. The light flesh color also makes it perfect for all applications as this product readily accepts makeup.

name: Modeling Wax
description:
Modeling wax is a foundational wax used to create face and body additions. Uses for modeling wax include warts, bumps, contusions, etc. The possibilities are endless!

Modeling wax is easy to shape and manipulate and can be applied using spirit gum. After you've applied the wax you can easily cover it with makeup, liquid latex or even fake blood for a natural and seamless special effect.

Available in 1 oz. and 7 oz. sizes.

name: Tooth Wax
description:
Tooth wax is a non-toxic wax which allows you to create a lost or rotting tooth effect. Depending on how thick you apply it, you can make the tooth disappear partially or completely. 

Black tooth wax will yield a more classic "lost tooth" effect while brown tooth wax applied around the edges creates more of a "rotting" effect. Both applications last for hours!

One pot is 1/8 oz.

name: Flexible Wax Sealer
description:
This flexible collodion product can be used to seal modeling wax and prepare it for application of texture and/or makeup. Because this protective skin contains castor oil, it makes successive applications of texture and makeup appear natural, even and consistent, extends the life of your wax appliance, and reduces chalkiness.

Available in 1 oz. size.

name: Spirit Gum & Remover
description:
Spirit gum is the classic theater and costume adhesive. Can be used for everything from attaching prosthetic pieces to crepe wool applications. It will offer hours of durable adhesion. Spirit gum is recommended for light-weight applications. 

Please perform a spot test on skin first to be sure you don't experience any irritation or allergic reactions. Always remove with spirit gum remover, this will ensure you don't experience any irritation when removing an application. 

Spirit Gum is available in 1 oz. and 8 oz. sizes. Please contact us for 32 oz. size.

Spirit Gum Remover is available in 1/4 oz. 1 oz. 2 oz. and 8 oz. Please contact us for 1 gallon size.

name: Castor Seal
description:
This high-quality castor oil is design to protect and give a proper finish to surfaces that contain no oil. For example, if you'd like to apply regular creme makeup to a latex appliance, you must apply a layer of castor oil first, otherwise your application will appear chalky and inconsistent. Castor seal can also be used in wound application to give each layer something to stick to without creating a gunky appearance.

Available in 1 oz. size.

name: Clear Liquid Latex
description:
Liquid latex can be used to create designs and effects that move with you. Once dry, liquid latex remains light and flexible. 

Clear liquid latex remains the most versatile product used by special effects artists. It can be used to create scars, wrinkling and blistering effects as well as blending prosthetic seams. This liquid latex is of amazing quality, and is perfect for creating latex appliances (see below for ordering 1 gallon size.)

For example: to create a realistic blister, apply a thin round-ish layer of clear liquid latex, allow to dry until clear, then pinch and pull the center out. Roll the edges out to create the look of dead skin, or apply blood gel for an oozing blister effect. 

If applying liquid latex to skin with hair, we highly recommend applying a thin layer of aloe vera gel first. To remove liquid latex, simply pick up a corner and peel off.

Warning: Please do a small skin test first as latex allergy is a rare but real condition!

Available in 2 oz. and 8 oz. Please contact us for 1 gallon size.

name: RMG Creme Wheels
description:
Rubber Mask Grease (RMG) is a castor oil-based creme makeup that is perfect for painting latex and the surrounding skin. Simply applying creme makeup over latex would yield a chalky appearance, however, the presence of castor oil in this formula allows for a natural finish. RMG is hyper-pigmented, offering great coverage over a wide variety of skin (real or fake) surfaces.

The derma formula contains the most popular natural skin tones which can be mixed together to match your unique skin tone. This is the product we recommend using to blend the seams of our elf ear prosthetics. 

The injury formula is ideal for creating different stages of bruising as well as other trauma and wound effects.

Available in 1 oz. size.

name: Unpainted Bone Demon Horns
description:
This set of horns is perfect for demons, devils and other horned creatures.

They are made of slip cast latex and dusted with hypoallergenic baby powder. They can easily be attached using spirit gum and are ready to accept any paint or makeup that is safe for use on latex and the surrounding skin. 

Bone demon horns measure approximately 1 in. long from front to tip.

name: Deluxe Vampire Fangs
description:
These movie-quality fangs are custom fit caps that will last for years! A specially formulated dental material allows for a tight and lasting fit. Because they are custom fit there is no need for messy glues or constant re-fitting. After a one-time fitting they simply "snap" on and off. These fangs will not impair your speech.

Each pair of fangs comes in its own crypt case with step-by-step instructions and everything you need to create your custom fit fangs in just minutes.

Subtle fangs are well suited for those with smaller teeth and classic for those with average sized teeth.
